name: Safehouse (team7_mds)
description: Safehouse is a horror game set in a future where robots have taken over and have begun to experiment on humans. The player’s goal is to escape a test lab disguised as a house by using tools and objects they find throughout the game to work their way out. They will need to avoid being captured by robots roaming the lab as they explore various areas in order to find an exit. Using a combination of screwdrivers and fuses found around the house and lab, the player is able to gain access to new areas and find their way to freedom.
